name: Python crash course
details: How to become a Python Developer and get hired! Build 20+ projects, learn Web Development, Data Visualization and more
overview: Creating Projects using Python Programming Language.

name: Android Development
details: Learn Android App Development from Zero to Hero - Build 20+ Apps from scratch - Become a real developer
overview: Learn core concepts: activities, services, content providers
Building real apps and publish them to playstore
Become a professional Native app developer

name: Blockchain Development
details: Use Ethereum, Solidity, and Smart Contracts to build production-ready apps based on the blockchain
overview: Learn the true purpose and capabilities of Ethereum and Solidity

name: Python for Data Science and Machine Learning
details: Learn about Data Science and Machine Learning with Python! Including Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn and more!
overview: You will learn how to use data science and machine learning with Python
You will create data pipeline workflows to analyze, visualize, and gain insights from data.
You will build a portfolio of data science projects with real world data.
You will be able to analyze your own data sets and gain insights through data science.

name: Python Django
details: Learn the entire technology stack to create beautiful and responsive website with Python and Django
overview: How url routing works in Django
The meaning of MVT as a concept in Django
Adding Custom Database To Django Project

name: Complete Angular Development
details: Get job ready with Angular! Master the latest version of Angular and learn to build large scale apps that set you apart
